articles.title: How to see Mars from the UK this week - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Red Planet will be in opposition on Thursday morning - meaning it'll be located in the opposite direction to the sun, relative to Earth.
articles.content:
This week stargazers in the UK will get the best view of Mars on offer this decade and they won't need a telescope.
